item.title: How do I use an Item with an Object ? =)
item.dc:creator: @Lallz Lallz
item.description:
@Lallz wrote:

I know this is using an Item on an Item… but I haven’t found anything like items used on objects… anyone have a code that they can give me?

if ((itemUsed == 233) && (useWith == 237)) { deleteItem(237, getItemSlot(237), 1); addItem(235, 1); } else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(180, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); resetWC(); } else { sM("You need a firemaking of 0 to burn normal logs."); }
